thread.title: Labour To Launch Review Of All Taxes
thread.title_full: Labour To Launch Review Of All Taxes

title: Labour To Launch Review Of All Taxes
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Sep 28, 2015, 08:18 BST - UK Markets close in 8 hrs 12 mins Labour To Launch Review Of All Taxes By (c) Sky News 2015 | Sky News – 7 minutes ago View Photo 

Labour's shadow chancellor has told Sky News he will launch a review into all taxation policies and financial institutions. 
Speaking ahead of his address to the Labour Party Conference today, John McDonnell said he would examine "all taxation policies" to ensure the poorest don't shoulder the cost of deficit reduction. 
The controversial shadow chancellor said he would be launching a "huge exercise" to ask the British people how to run the economy and make sure all the party policies 
He said he would "review all the institutions that currently we use to run the economy". 
:: Watch shadow chancellor John McDonnell's speech live on Sky News at 12.15pm
